name: Hilton Garden Inn Pismo Beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stopped on a Saturday with no reservations and they could take us--phew!!--lots of places booked.
reviews.title: Comfortable midway spot to stop on the coast

reviews.text: The two women on the front desk were wonderful (as were the warm cookies); kept punching in codes till they found us a room on the "view" side of the hotel (the pool and a sliver of ocean way out there rather than parking lot) and a rate that included breakfast for two for much less than buying breakfast separately would have cost. They were also very helpful with recommendations for restaurants in Pismo Beach--about a 5 minute drive away.
reviews.title: Nice...but I have had better..Deborah though she was great!!!

reviews.text: King room was large, clean with a dial-a-firmness mattress; and had a small refrigerator (not stocked), desk and sofa with decent lighting. Free wi-fi for Hilton HHonors members. Don't know if it's free for others.
reviews.title: Very nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Small bar near reception. Not long hours, 5-9 I think? After getting back from dinner, got a glass of wine and was able to take it to the room.
reviews.title: Newly renovated hotel that is wonderful

reviews.text: Outdoor pool and hot tub looked nice, but we didn't use it.
reviews.title: Fantastic Customer Service!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: stayed here for one night, and really liked it. Front desk staff were excellent. Downtown isn't really walkable, although a short drive. Room was huge, and very comfortable. Free wifi in room and free printing in their excellent business centre. The overall experience was only slightly let down by poor staff at the breakfast. They got our order wrong twice, and brought cold water for tea?!? A pretty minor bump in an overall excellent experience.
reviews.title: Excellent

aka: Hilton Garden Inn Pismo Beach Hotel Pismo Beach
description: With 120 spacious rooms and suites, the Hilton Garden Inn Pismo beach is your new Central Coast vacation headquarters. Amenities include the Great American Grill restaurant serving breakfast and dinner, room service, Pavilion Lounge, free wireless and hard-wired internet access, pool, spa, business center, Pavilion Market serving snacks and beverages, a fitness center, a guest laundry, and over 1,600 square feet of meeting and banquet space. Close to great restaurants and the Pismo Prime Outlets, and only minutes from the beach, the Oceano Dunes, wineries, golf courses and quaint coastal towns.
